s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 screws and blower (rear) resistor.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 2 COOLER UNIT DRAIN HOSE

s2.ptxt: Remove the No. 2 cooler unit drain hose.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR BLOWER MOTOR WITH FAN SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Remove the 3 screws and rear blower motor with fan sub-assembly.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE AIR CONDITIONING TUBE AND ACCESSORY ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Detach the 3 claws and remove the cooling unit case (motor side).
Remove the evaporator sub-assembly from the cooler unit case (sink side).
Using a 4 mm socket hexagon wrench, remove the 2 hexagon bolts and air conditioning tube and accessory assembly.
Remove the 2 O-rings from the air conditioning tube and accessory assembly.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR COOLING UNIT EXPANSION VALVE

s2.ptxt: Remove the rear cooling unit expansion valve from the evaporator sub-assembly.
Remove the 2 O-rings from the evaporator sub-assembly.
